title: [PC] Populous: The Beginning gamepack -WackyAnimation-
description:
This is the best damn RTS game ever made.

Developer(s) 	Bullfrog Productions
Publisher(s) 	Electronic Arts
Engine 	Modified Magic Carpet engine
Platform(s) 	PC (Windows), PlayStation, PlayStation Network
Release date 	Windows:
November 30, 1998
PlayStation:
April 2, 1999

PlayStation Network:
December 20, 2007

Genre(s) 	God game, Real-time strategy
Mode(s) 	Single-player, Multiplayer
Rating(s) 	ESRB: Teen (T)
System requirements 	Pentium 133 MHz, 16 MB RAM, Windows 95, DirectX, CD-ROM drive, and 100 MB hard drive


Basic info
you are the shaman of the tribe. Each tribe is in a battle with each other to earn up enough mana to become a god. By taking over the planets, the shaman will have enough mana to finish her task. As the chosen one you have control over your followers and will learn spells along the way.

Setting up the game
This guide is to start playing online. If you want to just play the game then you are a fucking retard. (All files for offline and online play are included)


ok so download the game, install pop_full.exe and then onto the multiplayer part.

Playing online
This is the main site and it hosts the leagues and matchmaker: <a href="
http://popre.net/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://popre.net/</a>

Also Included:
Several user made programs all tested. Map editors, mod, patches.

Enjoy -WackyAnimation
